scripts.db-test: r(){ export DB_ENCRYPTION_KEYS='[{"name":"general","version":1,"primary":true,"material":"5vRrp0H4oRgdkPnX1qQcS54Q0xggr6iyho42IQ1rO+c="}]';export DB_HOST=127.0.0.1;export DB_PORT=23306;export DB_USER=root;export DB_PASSWORD=test; yarn db-test-run; };r
scripts.db-test-init: r(){ export DB_ENCRYPTION_KEYS='[{"name":"general","version":1,"primary":true,"material":"5vRrp0H4oRgdkPnX1qQcS54Q0xggr6iyho42IQ1rO+c="}]';export DB_HOST=127.0.0.1;export DB_PORT=23306;export DB_USER=root;export DB_PASSWORD=test;find . -name "*.sql" | xargs cat | mysql -h $DB_HOST -P $DB_PORT -p$DB_PASSWORD -u root && yarn typeorm migration:run; };r
scripts.purge: yarn clean && yarn clean:node && yarn run rimraf yarn.lock
